VXLIB Function Reference

Warp Perspective

OpenVX Function Description

  • Performs a perspective transform on an image.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/da/d6a/group__group__vision__function__warp__perspective.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_warpPerspectiveBilinear_bc_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_warpPerspectiveBilinear_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_warpPerspectiveNearest_bc_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_warpPerspectiveNearest_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
